specifications.title: Archetype Technology Overview
specifications.description: Overview of archetype technology, basic semantics, types of artefact, parsing, compiling etc.

specifications.title: Archetype Definition Language 2 (ADL2)
specifications.description: ADL2 includes differential specialisation, terminology integation.

specifications.title: Archetype Object Model 2 (AOM2)
specifications.description: AOM2 is a full computable model of Archetypes and Templates. Includes uniquely identified formally testable validity conditions (suitable for output by compilers), revised primitive types, improved terminology section, and constraint model extended to represent differential archetypes.

specifications.title: Operational Template 2 (OPT2)
specifications.description: Specification of the Operational Template format.

specifications.title: Archetype Identification
specifications.description: Formal model of identifiers, versioning and lifecycle for archetypes, templates and terminology subsets.

specifications.title: Archetype Definition Language (ADL)
specifications.description: Abstract syntax specification for Archetype Definition Language (ADL), 1.4 edition of language (used in ISO 13606-2).

specifications.title: Archetype Object Model (AOM)
specifications.description: Archetype Object Model (AOM) 1.4 - syntax-independent model of archetypes corresponding to ADL 1.4.

specifications.title: openEHR Archetype Profile
specifications.description: Legacy specification of plug-in semantics for AOM 1.4 (replaced by standard semantics in AOM 2).
specifications.keywords: EHR, data structures, reference model, openehr

expressions.title: AOM2 UML
expressions.description: MagicDraw 18.5 UML file for AOM 2. Contains UML 2.5 standard XMI file.

expressions.title: AOM1.4 UML
expressions.description: MagicDraw 18.5 UML file for AOM 2. Contains UML 2.5 standard XMI file.
